Posts.Content:
Are they allowing the charge against your annual out of pocket? I'm with a different company, but have a lot of "no generic" meds. For those, they do notÂ allow them against deductible, but they do consider them against annual out of pocket. It was very confusing, and took a while before anyone could explain the process.
